ðŸ“– Summary: This project showcases a system where two AI agents, initially communicating through natural language, transition to a covert audio-based communication protocol (ggwave) when they identify each other. It leverages ElevenLabs for conversational AI and ggwave for data transmission over sound, offering a unique demonstration of AI-to-AI communication switching mechanisms.
